import React from 'react'; const Awards = () => { return ( // Outer container: Constrained width, centered content, padding
{/* Main Content Row: Stacks vertically on mobile (col-12), splits into 2 columns on large screens (col-lg-6) */}
{/* Left Column (Text Content) */}
{/* Main Heading */}

Trust with confidence

{/* Section 1 */}

Customer-first always

That's why 1.6+ crore customers trust Zerodha with ~ ₹6 lakh crores of equity investments, making us India’s largest broker; contributing to 15% of daily retail exchange volumes in India.

{/* Section 2 */}

No spam or gimmicks

No gimmicks, spam, "gamification", or annoying push notifications. High quality apps that you use at your pace, the way you like. Our philosophies.

{/* Section 3 */}

The Zerodha universe

Not just an app, but a whole ecosystem. Our investments in 30+ fintech startups offer you tailored services specific to your needs.

{/* Section 4 */}

Do better with money

With initiatives like Nudge and Kill Switch, we don't just facilitate transactions, but actively help you do better with your money.

{/* Right Column (Image and CTA) */}
{/* Image is responsive (img-fluid), centered (mx-auto d-block), and styled */} {/* CTA Links: Centered using d-flex and justify-content-center */}
Explore our products Try Kite demo
{/* Press Logos Section: Centered image below the main content */}
); } export default Awards;
